document.full_text: a decade after winning his first senior pga championship, tom watson won the title for a second time with a playoff victory over fellow american david eger in louisville, kentucky on sunday.
document.title: golden oldie watson wins senior pga title in playoff
lines_and_colors: a decade after winning his first senior pga championship, tom watson won the title for a second time with a playoff victory over fellow american david eger in louisville, kentucky on sunday.
